module:
tubhailte
tubhailte a tablecloth is a feminine simple common noun.
adjectives
geal
tubhailte gheal a white tablecloth –
An ann geal a tha an tubhailte seo? Chan ann. Dé an dath a tha air an tubhailte? Tha dath gorm.
Is this tablecloth white? No, it isn’t. What colour is the tablecloth? It is blue. td. 35
gorm
tubhailte ghorm a blue tablecloth –
An ann geal a tha an tubhailte seo? Chan ann. Dé an dath a tha air an tubhailte? Tha dath gorm. Alasdair, an e dath gorm a tha air an tubhailte? ’S e.
Is this tablecloth white? No, it isn’t. What colour is the tablecloth? It is blue. Alexander – is the colour of the tablecloth blue? Yes, it is. td. 35
dath
